entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:06 p.m. MDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 8:04 PM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:04 PM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:04 PM MDT Thursday 27 April 2023
